name: OptionCast
overview:
OptionCast is an option forecasting and analysis service. The company offers option analysis on earnings plays, expiration, biotech, pin risk, and volatility. They also service active options traders by streaming large options trades, unusual option trades, and equity block trades. OptionCast believes that by looking at past options trades you can predict the future. Their services will help traders find under priced or over priced options. Furthermore, it offers options management, options news articles, and support services. The company serves the options community by providing live chat and forum services.

OptionCast LLC, was started in 2011 as stock options trading blog. It has since grown into a full service analytical options site. The company is headed by 3 options traders with 34 years of experience. They are headquartered in Chicago, IL.
